nodes.text: This OOM security battle droid was stationed on the Separatist planet Lola Sayu in the Citadel prison around 21 BBY at the time of the Battle of Lola Sayu.

During the Battle of Lola Sayu, this OOM security battle droid along with many others were under command of prison warden, Phindian Osi Sobeck in the Citadel's command room . After the elite team of clone troopers led by Obi-Wan Kenobi and Anakin Skywalker arrived in the detention center and rescued Even Piell who was being held there for interrogation, they split up into two squads. The one led by Obi-Wan Kenobi was eventually captured by Sobeck and the droids that should have taken them to the interrogation level were intercepted by R2-D2's squadron of reprogrammed battle droids which helped the prisoners get to the detention facility's landing bay. This droid reported the incident to Sobeck, who in turn became enraged, but their discussion was cut short by K2-B4.
This droid, like every battle droid in The Clone Wars movie and The Clone Wars TV series, was voiced by Matthew Wood. His name was never given.
